usage.cn: 明明是两个人的回忆，却只有我一个人珍藏。
usage.eng: It's only me who treasures up the memory which belongs to both of us.

usage.cn: 思念是一条细长的线，一端系着你，一端系着我，时刻连接着两颗跳动不息的心。
usage.eng: Thinking of each other is just like a thread connecting both you on the one end and me on the other end.

usage.cn: 他们彼此深信，是瞬间迸发的热情让他们相遇。这样的确定是美丽的，但变幻无常更为美丽。【几米语录】
usage.eng: They're both convinced that a sudden passion joined them. Such certainty is beautiful, but uncertainty is more beautiful still.

usage.cn: 爱我或者恨我，我都无所谓。爱我，我在你心里；恨我，我在你脑海
usage.eng: Love me or hate me, both are in my favor. If you love me, I'll always be in your heart. If you hate me, I'll always be in your mind
